# The `MemoryUse` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Represents read-only accesses to memory.

In particular, the set of Instructions that will be represented by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryuse">MemoryUse</a>&#39;s is exactly the set of Instructions for which <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaresults/#a2205e49ace8bb2fd9934342ff6a25e13">AliasAnalysis::getModRefInfo</a> returns &quot;Ref&quot;.

Definition at line 309 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/memoryssa-h">MemorySSA.h</a>.

### isOptimized() {#a941afe9aa7511796d27d11486a70c6c5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool llvm::MemoryUse::isOptimized () const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Whether the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memoryuse">MemoryUse</a> is optimized.

If ensureOptimizedUses() was called, uses will usually be optimized, but this is not guaranteed (e.g. due to invalidation and optimization limits.)

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/memoryssa-h/#l00336">336</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/memoryssa-h">MemorySSA.h</a>.
